content: I have a pdf of labwork information and I want to associate it with the patient as is. I am planning to use this resource https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/diagnosticreport.html . It has a media->link which could potentially have any url including a png/pdf etc. Is that a standard way to do this ?
That is one way. You could also look at using DocumentReference.
Thank you so much. Am checking out those options.
